Adam is at the forefront of SEO and SEM tactics. He is not the follower but the person whose strategies are studied in the industry.I have had the privilege to work with him on many projects. He is the person that I collaborate with, work for and recommend to clients. It’s his technical understanding of taking what a client needs and figuring out how to deliver and exceed expectations. I've seen this carried out first-hand and because of the way Adam thinks outside the box, clients are able to receive a fresh perspective and approach to improving their online presence. Adam doesn't present a carbon copy plan for tackling SEO and SEM problems. Everything is customised for each client depending on their needs (i.e. branding, improving landing pages, creating websites, running PPC campaigns, etc...).I would refer Adam for any project!
